title: Teenagers Keep Vaping Despite Crackdowns on E-Cigarettes
description: While use among youths has fallen since the peaks of 2018-19, resumption of in-school classes this year shows students still have access to flavored, disposable vapes.
dc:creator: Christina Jewett
category: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
media:credit: Gabriela Bhaskar for The New York Times
media:description: High school students reported strongly favoring fruit- and candy-flavored vapes.
